text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-79E8 17.3" IPS FHD 144 Hz G-Sync, Intel Core i7 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-79E8 17.3" IPS FHD 144 Hz G-Sync, Intel Core i7 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-79E8 17.3" IPS FHD 144 Hz G-Sync, Intel Core i7 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-79E8 17.3" IPS FHD 144 Hz G-Sync, Intel Core i7 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-79E8 17.3" IPS FHD 144 Hz G-Sync, Intel Core i7 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home!
